short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert variable data and logic to personalize your pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert variable data and logic into any web editor, text area or input box. The variable tokens will be replaced at run time with variable data from your contact records within your Postalytics campaign
